description: A proof-of-concept dashboard designed for real-time monitoring of energy usage and costs, enabling data-driven decisions to optimize power efficiency in industrial settings.

panels.description: A proof-of-concept dashboard designed for real-time monitoring of energy usage and costs, enabling data-driven decisions to optimize power efficiency in industrial settings.

options.content: Energy Usage Real-Time Monitoring Dashboard

targets.rawSql: SELECT EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM NOW()) * 1000 AS current_timestamp_epoch;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    v_a,
    v_b,
    v_c,
    (v_a + v_b + v_c) / 3.0 AS v_avg,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Ensure we don't select any data beyond the current datetime
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Order by descending timestamp to get the latest record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN v_avg = 0 THEN 0  -- Handle case where v_avg is 0 to avoid division by zero
    ELSE GREATEST(
      ABS(v_avg - v_a),
      ABS(v_avg - v_b),
      ABS(v_avg - v_c)
    ) / v_avg * 100
  END AS voltage_imbalance_percentage
FROM
  latest_measurement;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    i_a,
    i_b,
    i_c,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Ensure we don't select any data beyond the current datetime
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Order by descending timestamp to get the latest record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  GREATEST(ABS(i_a), ABS(i_b), ABS(i_c)) AS max_absolute_current  -- Return the max absolute value of the currents
FROM
  latest_measurement;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    kVAR_a, kVAR_b, kVAR_c,
    (kVAR_a + kVAR_b + kVAR_c) / 3.0 AS kVAR_avg,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Ensure we don't select any data beyond the current datetime
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Get the most recent record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  GREATEST(
    ABS(kVAR_avg - kVAR_a),
    ABS(kVAR_avg - kVAR_b),
    ABS(kVAR_avg - kVAR_c)
  ) / kVAR_avg * 100 AS kVAR_imbalance_percentage
FROM
  latest_measurement;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    kW_a, kW_b, kW_c,
    (kW_a + kW_b + kW_c) / 3.0 AS kW_avg,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Ensure we only get data up to the current timestamp
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Get the most recent record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  GREATEST(
    ABS(kW_avg - kW_a),
    ABS(kW_avg - kW_b),
    ABS(kW_avg - kW_c)
  ) / kW_avg * 100 AS kW_imbalance_percentage
FROM
  latest_measurement;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    pf_a,
    pf_b,
    pf_c,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Get data up to the current timestamp
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Get the latest record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  CASE
    WHEN pf_a = GREATEST(pf_a, pf_b, pf_c) THEN pf_a
    WHEN pf_b = GREATEST(pf_a, pf_b, pf_c) THEN pf_b
    ELSE pf_c
  END AS max_power_factor
FROM
  latest_measurement;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    thd_v_a,
    thd_v_b,
    thd_v_c,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Get data up to the current timestamp
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Get the latest record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  GREATEST(thd_v_a, thd_v_b, thd_v_c) AS max_thd_value
FROM
  latest_measurement;

WITH latest_measurement AS (
  SELECT
    thd_i_a,
    thd_i_b,
    thd_i_c,
    timestamp
  FROM
    measurements
  WHERE
    timestamp <= NOW()  -- Get data up to the current timestamp
  ORDER BY
    timestamp DESC  -- Get the latest record
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT
  GREATEST(thd_i_a, thd_i_b, thd_i_c) AS max_ithd_value
FROM
  latest_measurement;

panels.description: Total power consumed in kilowatt-hours (kWh) from the beginning of the current month up to the current date.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS total_energy_consumed
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND timestamp <= CURRENT_DATE
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Total Energy Usage

panels.description: The total cost in Philippine Pesos (PHP) incurred for power consumed from the 1st day of the current month up to the current date.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (SUM((ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate)) / 5 AS total_cost_php
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND timestamp <= CURRENT_DATE
LIMIT 1;

panels.title: Total Cost

panels.description: The efficiency of the system calculated as the ratio of kilowatts (kW) to kilovolt-amperes (kVA) (kW/kVA). The closer the ratio is to 1, the more efficiently the system is converting kVA into useful kW.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) AS month,
    AVG(CASE 
            WHEN kva_total != 0 THEN (kw_total / kva_total) * 100
            ELSE 0
        END) AS efficiency_score
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kva_total IS NOT NULL
    AND kw_total IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    month
ORDER BY
    month;

panels.title: Average Efficiency

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    m.meter_id AS meter,
    m.v_ab AS v_ab,
    m.v_bc AS v_bc,
    m.v_ca AS v_ca,
    m.i_a AS i_a,
    m.i_b AS i_b,
    m.i_c AS i_c,
    m.pf_a AS pf_a,
    m.pf_b AS pf_b,
    m.pf_c AS pf_c,
    m.thd_v_a AS v_thd_a,
    m.thd_v_b AS v_thd_b,
    m.thd_v_c AS v_thd_c,
    m.thd_i_a AS i_thd_a,
    m.thd_i_b AS it_thd_b,
    m.thd_i_c AS i_thd_c
FROM 
    measurements m
INNER JOIN (
    SELECT meter_id, MIN(ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (timestamp - NOW())))) AS closest_time_diff
    FROM measurements
    GROUP BY meter_id
) closest_times ON m.meter_id = closest_times.meter_id
AND ABS(EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (m.timestamp - NOW()))) = closest_times.closest_time_diff
ORDER BY m.meter_id;

panels.description: Target energy consumed in kilowatt-hours (kWh) for the current month.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $target_usage;

panels.title: Target Usage

panels.description: Target cost in Philippine Pesos (PHP) incurred for the current month.

targets.rawSql: SELECT $target_usage*$kwh_rate;

panels.title: Target Cost

panels.description: The total cost in Philippine Pesos (PHP) of energy usage for the previous month.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate) / 5 AS total_cost_php
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '1 month';

panels.title: Previous Bill

panels.description: Projected total power consumed in kilowatt-hours (kWh) for the current month. The projection is calculated by averaging the daily power usage observed so far this month and multiplying it by the total number of days in the month, providing an estimate of the likely total consumption by month's end.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    (SUM(ABS(kwh)) / (EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) - 1)) 
    * EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day') 
    / 5 AS projected_usage
FROM 
    measurements 
WHERE 
    timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND kwh IS NOT NULL
    AND timestamp < CURRENT_DATE; -- Avoid including today's data in the calculation

panels.title: Projected Usage

panels.description: Projected total cost in Philippine pesos (PHP) for the current month. This estimate is based on the projected total power consumed in kilowatt-hours (kWh), calculated by averaging daily usage so far and scaling it to the entire month.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    (SUM(ABS(kwh)) / (EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) - 1)) 
    * EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day') 
    * $kwh_rate / 5 AS projected_cost
FROM 
    measurements 
WHERE 
    timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND kwh IS NOT NULL
    AND timestamp < CURRENT_DATE; -- Avoid including today's data in the calculation

panels.title: Projected Cost

panels.description: An estimate of the expected savings or additional costs by the end of the month, based on the current average daily usage rate. This projection is calculated by comparing the estimated end-of-month total with the previous months total usage.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    -- Calculate the projected savings or loss
    (previous_month_cost.total_cost_php - projected_cost.projected_cost_php) AS projected_savings_loss
FROM 
    -- Subquery for the previous month's total cost (actual bill)
    (SELECT 
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate AS total_cost_php
    FROM 
        measurements
    WHERE 
        DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '1 month'
    ) AS previous_month_cost,
    
    -- Subquery for the projected cost for the current month based on data so far
    (SELECT 
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) / (EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) - 1) 
        * EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day') 
        * $kwh_rate AS projected_cost_php
    FROM 
        measurements 
    WHERE 
        timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
        AND kwh IS NOT NULL
        AND timestamp < CURRENT_DATE -- Avoid including today's data in the calculation
    ) AS projected_cost;

panels.title: Projected Savings

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN meter_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN 'Tenant ' || meter_id
        ELSE 'Unknown Tenant'
    END AS Tenant, 
    SUM(ABS(kWh)) AS usage_kWh, 
    SUM(ABS(kWh) * $kwh_rate) AS cost_PHP
FROM 
    measurements
WHERE 
    meter_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5 
    AND DATE_PART('year', timestamp) = DATE_PART('year', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND DATE_PART('month', timestamp) = DATE_PART('month', CURRENT_DATE)
GROUP BY 
    meter_id
ORDER BY 
    meter_id;

panels.description: Displays all pending and firing alerts.
panels.title: Alarm Logs

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
    TO_CHAR(timestamp, 'Mon') AS month,  -- Format the month as 'Jan', 'Feb', etc.
    SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) = 2022 THEN ABS(kwh) ELSE 0 END) / 5 AS "2022", -- Divide by 5
    SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) = 2023 THEN ABS(kwh) ELSE 0 END) / 5 AS "2023", -- Divide by 5
    SUM(CASE WHEN EXTRACT(YEAR FROM timestamp) = 2024 THEN ABS(kwh) ELSE 0 END) / 5 AS "2024", -- Divide by 5
    -- Hidden fields for field override
    (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate) / 5 AS actual_cost, -- Divide actual cost by 5
    (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate * 1.1) / 5 AS target_cost -- Divide target cost by 5
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kwh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp), TO_CHAR(timestamp, 'Mon')  -- Group by both month number and month abbreviation
ORDER BY
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp);  -- Ensure chronological order by month

SELECT
    LEFT(
        CASE 
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 0 THEN 'Sunday'
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 1 THEN 'Monday'
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 2 THEN 'Tuesday'
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 3 THEN 'Wednesday'
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 4 THEN 'Thursday'
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 5 THEN 'Friday'
            WHEN EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp) = 6 THEN 'Saturday'
        END, 3
    ) AS day_of_week,
    AVG(ABS(kwh)) AS avg_kwh
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kwh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp)
ORDER BY
    EXTRACT(DOW FROM timestamp);

SELECT
    SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS total_power_consumed_kwh
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND timestamp <= CURRENT_DATE;

SELECT 
    (SUM(ABS(kwh)) / (EXTRACT(DAY FROM CURRENT_DATE) - 1)) 
    * EXTRACT(DAY FROM DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE) + INTERVAL '1 month' - INTERVAL '1 day') 
    / 5 AS projected_monthly_usage
FROM 
    measurements 
WHERE 
    timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)
    AND kwh IS NOT NULL
    AND timestamp < CURRENT_DATE; -- Avoid including today's data in the calculation

SELECT
    AVG(monthly_total) / 5 AS average_kwh
FROM (
    SELECT
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) AS monthly_total
    FROM
        measurements
    GROUP BY
        DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp)
) AS monthly_totals;

WITH monthly_totals AS (
    SELECT
        DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) AS month,        -- Group by month
        (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate) / 5 AS monthly_cost   -- Calculate total cost (PHP) for the month and divide by 5
    FROM
        measurements
    WHERE
        timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '3 years'  -- Limit to last 3 years
    GROUP BY
        month
),
cumulative_avg_cost AS (
    SELECT
        month,
        monthly_cost,
        AVG(monthly_cost) OVER (ORDER BY month ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS avg_monthly_cost  -- Cumulative average of monthly cost
    FROM
        monthly_totals
)

SELECT
    month,
    monthly_cost AS actual_monthly_cost,    -- Actual monthly cost in PHP (divided by 5)
    avg_monthly_cost                        -- Cumulative average monthly cost up to the current month (divided by 5)
FROM
    cumulative_avg_cost
ORDER BY
    month;

SELECT
    CASE
        WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM timestamp) BETWEEN 1 AND 7 THEN 'Week 1'
        WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM timestamp) BETWEEN 8 AND 14 THEN 'Week 2'
        WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM timestamp) BETWEEN 15 AND 21 THEN 'Week 3'
        WHEN EXTRACT(DAY FROM timestamp) BETWEEN 22 AND 31 THEN 'Week 4'
    END AS week_of_month,
    AVG(ABS(kwh)) AS avg_kwh
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kwh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    week_of_month
ORDER BY
    week_of_month;

WITH monthly_totals AS (
    SELECT
        DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) AS month,    -- Group by month
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS monthly_total          -- Total usage (kWh) for the month divided by 5
    FROM
        measurements
    WHERE
        timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '3 years'  -- Limit to last 3 years
    GROUP BY
        month
),
cumulative_avg_usage AS (
    SELECT
        month,
        monthly_total,
        AVG(monthly_total) OVER (ORDER BY month ROWS BETWEEN UNBOUNDED PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW) AS avg_monthly_usage  -- Cumulative average of monthly usage divided by 5
    FROM
        monthly_totals
)

SELECT
    month,
    monthly_total AS actual_monthly_usage,    -- Actual monthly usage in kWh (divided by 5)
    avg_monthly_usage                         -- Cumulative average monthly usage up to the current month (divided by 5)
FROM
    cumulative_avg_usage
ORDER BY
    month;

SELECT
    TO_CHAR(timestamp, 'Mon') AS month_name,  -- Extracts the month as 'Jan', 'Feb', etc.
    AVG(ABS(kwh)) AS avg_kwh
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kwh IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
    TO_CHAR(timestamp, 'Mon'), EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp)
ORDER BY
    EXTRACT(MONTH FROM timestamp);  -- Orders by the month number

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(v_ab) AS phase_ab,                  -- Average for phase AB voltage
    AVG(v_bc) AS phase_bc,                  -- Average for phase BC voltage
    AVG(v_ca) AS phase_ca                   -- Average for phase CA voltage
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    v_ab IS NOT NULL AND
    v_bc IS NOT NULL AND
    v_ca IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(thd_v_a) AS phase_a,                -- Average THD for voltage in phase A
    AVG(thd_v_b) AS phase_b,                -- Average THD for voltage in phase B
    AVG(thd_v_c) AS phase_c                 -- Average THD for voltage in phase C
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    thd_v_a IS NOT NULL AND
    thd_v_b IS NOT NULL AND
    thd_v_c IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(i_a) AS phase_a,                    -- Average for phase A current
    AVG(i_b) AS phase_b,                    -- Average for phase B current
    AVG(i_c) AS phase_c                     -- Average for phase C current
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    i_a IS NOT NULL AND
    i_b IS NOT NULL AND
    i_c IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(thd_i_a) AS phase_a,                -- Average THD for current in phase A
    AVG(thd_i_b) AS phase_b,                -- Average THD for current in phase B
    AVG(thd_i_c) AS phase_c                 -- Average THD for current in phase C
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    thd_i_a IS NOT NULL AND
    thd_i_b IS NOT NULL AND
    thd_i_c IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(pf_a) AS phase_a,                   -- Average power factor for phase A
    AVG(pf_b) AS phase_b,                   -- Average power factor for phase B
    AVG(pf_c) AS phase_c                    -- Average power factor for phase C
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    pf_a IS NOT NULL AND
    pf_b IS NOT NULL AND
    pf_c IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS total_kwh              -- Total energy consumption for each hour
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kwh IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(kvar_a) AS phase_a,                 -- Average reactive power for phase A
    AVG(kvar_b) AS phase_b,                 -- Average reactive power for phase B
    AVG(kvar_c) AS phase_c                  -- Average reactive power for phase C
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kvar_a IS NOT NULL AND
    kvar_b IS NOT NULL AND
    kvar_c IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    SUM(kvar_total) / 5 AS total_kvar           -- Total reactive power for each hour
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kvar_total IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    AVG(kw_a) AS phase_a,                   -- Average active power for phase A
    AVG(kw_b) AS phase_b,                   -- Average active power for phase B
    AVG(kw_c) AS phase_c                    -- Average active power for phase C
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kw_a IS NOT NULL AND
    kw_b IS NOT NULL AND
    kw_c IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

SELECT
    DATE_TRUNC('hour', timestamp) AS hour,  -- Truncate to hour for hourly aggregation
    SUM(kw_total) / 5 AS total_kw               -- Total active power for each hour
FROM
    measurements
WHERE
    kw_total IS NOT NULL AND
    DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) = DATE_TRUNC('month', CURRENT_DATE)  -- Filter for the current month
GROUP BY
    hour
ORDER BY
    hour;

WITH weekly_data AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('week', timestamp) AS week,
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS total_weekly_kwh,
        (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate) / 5 AS total_weekly_cost
    FROM 
        measurements
    WHERE 
        timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '3 years'
        AND kwh IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY 
        week
    ORDER BY 
        week
)
SELECT 
    week,
    total_weekly_kwh AS weekly_power_usage,
    total_weekly_cost AS weekly_power_cost
FROM 
    weekly_data;

WITH monthly_data AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('month', timestamp) AS month,
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS total_monthly_kwh,
        (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate) / 5 AS total_monthly_cost
    FROM 
        measurements
    WHERE 
        timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '3 years'
        AND kwh IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY 
        month
    ORDER BY 
        month
)
SELECT 
    month,
    total_monthly_kwh AS monthly_power_usage,
    total_monthly_cost AS monthly_power_cost
FROM 
    monthly_data;

WITH yearly_data AS (
    SELECT 
        DATE_TRUNC('year', timestamp) AS year,
        SUM(ABS(kwh)) / 5 AS total_yearly_kwh,
        (SUM(ABS(kwh)) * $kwh_rate) / 5 AS total_yearly_cost
    FROM 
        measurements
    WHERE 
        timestamp >= DATE_TRUNC('year', CURRENT_DATE) - INTERVAL '3 years'
        AND kwh IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY 
        year
    ORDER BY 
        year
)
SELECT 
    year,
    total_yearly_kwh AS yearly_power_usage,
    total_yearly_cost AS yearly_power_cost
FROM 
    yearly_data;

ORDER BY created_at DESC 
LIMIT 1;

title: Main Dashboard
